price: 207 à quoi leur auront bien servi toutes ces jouissances passées ?
arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يُمَتَّعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yumattaʿūna
